text:
@marceelias @JohnJHarwood Not coronavirus? Well what about terrorists (ie Antifa and BLM) rioting in the streets? Or World War 3 w/ China - see our 2 aircraft carrier in South China Sea. And whatever tomorrow brings. 

There is no "can't" with these Republicans in power.
